body: Says his dick is too small, but she's still bleeding damn. :(
It's kinda sweet and fucked up at the same time.
Dude, the artist obsviously did not think the plot through, so stop trying to understand the non sense stuff, it is just a result of bad story writing.
anyone notice page 6 he held her ENTIRE THIGH WITH ONE HAND ALL THE WAY AROUND.....
I'm so confused on which character is who
Now we need part 2 where Kazuki (MC's friend) fuck Miyuki (MC's ex girlfriend) while they're still dating. Prequel.
well, for a "happy ending" the guy treated her like a toy, making he bleed by taking her first time ok, making her bleed y introducing various toy in her pussy..... not so sure about that.

So the backstory is that Akihiro's sister is in love with his buddy Taka, the MC, and this being a Mayo hentai her brother pimps her out to his friend to sooth his broken heart in a convoluted scheme to hook them up.  After the one week rental, he then tells Taka off-panel and has him agree to be a "rental boy" for her.  Thus beginning a cycle of rentals or an actual relationship.  I think this might be the kindest to his girl character Mayo's been ever.
Im fairly sure the brother is just setting them up, as it leads to specific  numbers,  and told them to say it before hand

Well that was a confusing read. I don't know if I'm right but here goes. There are 3 characters. Taka=mc. Akihiro=friend and Nanaka= friend's sister. 

Scenario 1.
Akihiro gave his friend and sister each a rental card and set up those 2. But then the last bit wouldn't make sense as she clearly introduced herself as a rental girl.

Scenario 2.
In the last page, the Taka she is speaking to is a completely different person than the one we know and she is using him as a replacement.

Scenario 3.
Page 15, she killed him.

Scenario 4.
Nanaka and Nana are actually different people and somehow Akihiro recruited Taka into the rental business.
